description:
As the gang comes to grips with the aftermath of the battle with Kamui, a familiar figure appears before Takasugi and the Kiheitai.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arc de la bataille finale de Rakuyô 11 - Premier élève
Battle on Rakuyo Arc: Part 11 - First Student
Rakuyou Kessen Hen Juuichi: Ichiban Deshi
洛陽決戦篇十一 一番弟子
